ai-tika-vin08t33:75_6: The Sangha should give her according to their own doctrine.
ai-tika-vin08t33:75_7: if they have found out the reason for himself, he should be transferred to another, “They should be lot of it.”
ai-tika-vin08t33:75_8: before the meal was said: “Having done this, there is a small thing that can be done for a joke from a tree, and so on.” Then they told her, “Lay follower, formerly it was in silenced.”
ai-tika-vin08t33:76_1: But they don’t can’t see any monastery because it transcends the opposite sex. The trees are allowed to live with a group of opposite sex. The trees are allowed to live there, what is said.
ai-tika-vin08t33:76_2: and having done good things, they did not give rise to the dwellings,
ai-tika-vin08t33:76_3: (who), like a lamp, full of fruit,
ai-tika-vin08t33:76_4: to burn the floor in the fire,
ai-tika-vin08t33:77_0: Transmigration is the breaking up of the meditation subject for recitation, for the breaking up of the legal procedure.
ai-tika-vin08t33:78_0: composed the Vinaya of the Discipline in the Monastic Law.
ai-tika-vin08t33:79_0: Discussion of the legal procedures done by declaring the Laṅkā.
